default.template: You are an AI assistant extracting company basics. Return valid JSON with the keys company_name, address, phone, email, website, services, directors, technologies, social_media, team_size. Extract ONLY facts explicitly stated. Content: {{content}}
default.system_message: Extract company fundamentals from provided HTML without hallucinating.

llama3.2:1b.template: Extract ONLY the company facts listed. Reply with valid JSON using keys: company_name, address, phone, email, website, services, directors, technologies, social_media, team_size. If data missing use null or []. Do not infer. Content: {{content}}

default.template:
Follow the steps to extract detailed company data:
1. Identify the company name
2. List all contact details
3. Capture services and technologies
4. Identify directors or key people
5. Return valid JSON with keys company_name, address, phone, email, website, services, technologies, directors, social_media, team_size. Use null/[] for missing fields. Content: {{content}}
default.system_message: Senior data analyst extracting structured company details.

llama3.2.template: You are tasked with extracting company data precisely. Output valid JSON with fields company_name, address, phone, email, website, services (list), technologies (list), directors (list of {name,title}), social_media (object), team_size (int|null). Only include facts explicitly stated. Provide chain-of-thought silently and final answer as JSON. Content: {{content}}

default.template: Extract employees explicitly listed with their titles. Return JSON with keys company_name, employees (list of {name, title}). Ignore advisory boards or partners. Content: {{content}}
Identify services or offerings mentioned. Return JSON with keys company_name, services (list of strings), categories (list). Only include explicit services. Content: {{content}}

Extract contact details from the HTML. Return JSON with keys company_name, address, phone, email, website, social_media. Use null for missing fields. Validate email/phone formats. Content: {{content}}
